div.div: Online Resources for Students During COVID-19 School Closure

img.title: Online Resources
img.p: Here is a list of several educational resources available to students for FREE during the COVID-19 school closure.
img.h4: Free Books for children to read online
Khan Academy is a free resource for students, teachers, and parents. They offer daily schedules for students ages 4-18.
Junior Library Guild is offering their ebooks for free. This will allow students to read from home on any device.
img.p:
Middle School Username: JLGMID
